title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Load the application 
2. Go to the series page 
3. Remove all data for a series 
4. Verify that no error message is displayed
